tr.td: Always. All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only. Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success. Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message

description.value: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0179 ( Response Level)

display.value: Always. All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only. Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success. Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
